name: stoqster
description: Follow your favourite stocks and fonds, and your portfolio's performance
author: Péter Blénessy

scripts.release:private: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --draft=false --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG"
scripts.release:sh: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --draft=false --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG" --repo PeterBlenessy/stoqster-releases
scripts.git:push: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && git add . && git commit -m "$CHANGELOG" && git push -u origin main
scripts.cicd: yarn git:push && yarn release:private && yarn publish:all
